abilities.name: Night Hunter
abilities.description: Innate: Vayne gains  30 bonus movement speed when moving towards a nearby  visible enemy champion.
descriptions: Innate: Vayne gains  30 bonus movement speed when moving towards a nearby  visible enemy champion.
Final Hour: Night Hunter's bonus movement speed is tripled to 90.

abilities.name: Tumble
abilities.description: Active: Vayne  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, and her next basic attack within 7 seconds deals bonus physical damage.
descriptions: Active: Vayne  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, and her next basic attack within 7 seconds deals bonus physical damage.
Tumble  resets Vayne's basic attack timer.

abilities.name: Silver Bolts
abilities.description: Passive: Vayne's basic attacks and  Condemn apply a stack of Silver Bolts for 3.5 seconds, up to 3 times. Attacking a new enemy removes all stacks from the previous target.
abilities.leveling: Bonus True Damage:4 / 6.5 / 9 / 11.5 / 14% of target's maximum healthMinimum True Damage:50 / 65 / 80 / 95 / 110
levelings: Bonus True Damage:4 / 6.5 / 9 / 11.5 / 14% of target's maximum healthMinimum True Damage:50 / 65 / 80 / 95 / 110
descriptions: Passive: Vayne's basic attacks and  Condemn apply a stack of Silver Bolts for 3.5 seconds, up to 3 times. Attacking a new enemy removes all stacks from the previous target.
The third stack consumes them all to deal  bonus true damage, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 200 against  monsters.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: Active: Vayne fires a heavy bolt at the target enemy, dealing physical damage,  knocking them back 475 units, and applying a  Silver Bolts stack.
descriptions: Active: Vayne fires a heavy bolt at the target enemy, dealing physical damage,  knocking them back 475 units, and applying a  Silver Bolts stack.
If the target collides with terrain, they take  bonus physical damage and are  stunned for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Final Hour
abilities.description: Active: Vayne equips her crossbow, gaining  bonus attack damage and tripling  Night Hunter's bonus for a duration.
descriptions: Active: Vayne equips her crossbow, gaining  bonus attack damage and tripling  Night Hunter's bonus for a duration.
Additionally,  Tumble gains  cooldown reduction, and casting it grants Vayne  invisibility for 1 second. Attacking or casting  Condemn breaks the stealth immediately.
While active, whenever an enemy  champion damaged by Vayne dies within 3 seconds, Final Hour's duration is extended by 4 seconds, up to the original duration.

name: Vayne
title: the Night Hunter
blurb: Shauna Vayne is a deadly, remorseless Demacian monster hunter, who has dedicated her life to finding and destroying the demon that murdered her family. Armed with a wrist-mounted crossbow and a heart full of vengeance, she is only truly happy when...
